title: Keep your Eye on Crypto: Cryptocurrency Facts You Need To Know
description: Although they currently have an insignificant role in large-scale global commerce, within the next twenty years cryptocurrencies will rise above their associated social stigmas, and become the mainstream medium of exchange in a hyper-globalized economy, displacing traditional national currencies and bringing with them waves of disruptive social changes.

author.name: John Yakubov
author.description: John is a young entrepeneur living in New York City. He aspires to become a dentist, and invest in Real Estate.
